mapper.select:
select
from WHEFSS_YE_INFO_LOG where account_num like '%%${accountNum}%%' or monitor_num like '%%${monitorNum}%%' or account_name like '%%${accountName}%%' or account_status like '%%${accountStatus}%%' or balance_time like '%%${balanceTime}%%' or retcode like '%%${retcode}%%' or retmsg like '%%${retmsg}%%' or trandate like '%%${trandate}%%' or reserve1 like '%%${reserve1}%%' or reserve2 like '%%${reserve2}%%' or reserve3 like '%%${reserve3}%%' order by account_num
mapper.delete: delete from WHEFSS_YE_INFO_LOG where id in (${ids})
mapper.update: update WHEFSS_YE_INFO_LOG set account_status=#{accountStatus}, balance_bank=#{balanceBank}, balance_system=#{balanceSystem} balance_time=#{balanceTime}, retcode=#{retcode}, retmsg=#{retmsg}, trandate=#{trandate}, user_id=#{userId}, user_name=#{userName}, reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3} where account_num = #{accountNum}
mapper.insert: insert into WHEFSS_YE_INFO_LOG(account_num, monitor_num, account_name, account_status, balance_bank, balance_system, balance_time, retcode, retmsg, trandate, user_id, user_name, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3) values( #{accountNum}, #{monitorNum}, #{accountName}, #{accountStatus}, #{balanceBank}, #{balanceSystem}, #{balanceTime}, #{retcode}, #{retmsg}, #{trandate}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{reserve1}, #{reserve2}, #{reserve3})

insert into WHEFSS_YE_INFO_LOG
account_num, monitor_num, account_name, account_status, balance_bank, balance_system, balance_time, retcode, retmsg, trandate, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3,
#{accountNum}, #{monitorNum}, #{accountName}, #{accountStatus}, #{balanceBank}, #{balanceSystem}, #{balanceTime}, #{retcode}, #{retmsg}, #{trandate}, #{reserve1}, #{reserve2}, #{reserve3},
mapper.sql: account_num, monitor_num, account_name, account_status, balance_bank, balance_system, balance_time, retcode, retmsg, trandate,user_id, user_name, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3
